meanings.sent1: The kickboxes at the gym are very skilled fighters.
meanings.sent2: I saw a kickboxer training at the dojo yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The kickboxes in the class always have the coolest gear.
meanings.sent4: She moves like a kickboxer, swift and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The kickboxes in the tournament displayed impressive techniques.

meanings.definition: A type of fitness class that incorporates elements of boxing and martial arts.
meanings.sent1: Let's sign up for the kickboxes class at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The kickboxes session was intense but fun.
meanings.sent3: I never knew kickboxes could make me sweat this much!
meanings.sent4: The kickboxes class is like a high-energy dance party.
meanings.sent5: Joining the kickboxes group has improved my fitness level.

meanings.definition: To engage in the sport of kickboxing.
meanings.sent1: I love to kickboxes with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She kickboxes regularly to stay in shape.
meanings.sent3: Let's kickboxes our way to victory!
meanings.sent4: He kickboxes his way through challenges with determination.
meanings.sent5: They kickboxes with passion and dedication.
